name: Sample City
description:
Simplicity is beauty, perfect simplicity is animated beauty.  Visit Sample City and collect samples of the beautiful music in various locations. Avoid red samples, catch green samples and other color buffs while enjoying beautiful midi songs.

This is the submission of Vicentek, Daystiny, Silvia, Marydia and Qrizly for the '22 Crayta Perfect Simplicity jam. Made using Daigoro's amazing Maestro package.

The game uses (modified) midis from https://www.promidifiles.com/free-midi-tracks/

A perfect sample city for a Perfect Simplicity Jam!
